SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Account for Required Input Keys in API Methods

To mitigate the possibility of Apex exceptions, several methods of the B2B Commerce for Visualforce API now check for certain required input keys. If a key is missing from the method's input map, the method returns a ccrz.ccApi.MissingInputException and includes any error messages in the ccrz.ccApi.MESSAGES return data key.

Where: This change applies to B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) in Lightning Experience and Salesforce Classic in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.

How: After you upgrade the managed package, API calls in your existing implementation begin checking for required parameters immediately.

Ensure that any subscriber code you've developed that references the following methods are calling the required input keys.

CLASS	METHOD	REQUIRED INPUT KEYS
ccrz.ccApiAccount	createAccount()	ccrz.ccApiAccount.ACCOUNT_NEW
ccrz.ccApiAddressBook	createAddressBook()	ccrz.ccApiAddressBook.ADDRESSBOOKS
removeAddressBook()	ccrz.ccApiAddressBook.IDS
ccrz.ccApiCart	cartAdjustment()	ccrz.ccApiCart.CART_ENCID
cloneCart()	ccrz.ccApiCart.CART_ID or ccrz.ccApiCart.CART_ENCID
createCartItemGroup()	ECartItemGroupsS
createWishList()	ccrz.ccApiCart.CART_ID or ccrz.ccApiCart.CART_ENCID
getDeliveryDates()	ccrz.cc_api_DeliveryDate.CART_ID or ccrz.ccApiCart.SHIPPING_ADDRLIST
getShippingOptions()	ccrz.ccApiCart.SHIPPING_ADDRLIST or ccrz.ccApiCart.SHIPPING_ADDR
initItemGroups()	ccrz.ccApiCart.CART_ENCID
place()	ccrz.ccApiCart.CART_ID or ccrz.ccApiCart.CART_ENCID
price()	ccrz.ccApiCart.CART_ID or ccrz.ccApiCart.CART_ENCID
processItemGroups()	ccrz.ccApiCart.CART_ENCID, ccrz.ccApiCart.TARGETGROUP, and ccrz.ccApiCart.MOVEDATA
removeCart()	ccrz.ccApiCart.CART_ID or ccrz.ccApiCart.CART_ENCID
removeFrom()	

ccrz.ccApiCart.CART_ID or ccrz.ccApiCart.CART_ENCID

AND

ccrz.ccApiCart.COUPON_CODE or ccrz.ccApiCart.LINE_DATA


transferCart()	ccrz.ccApiUser.USER_ID, ccrz.ccApiUser.USER_NAME, and ccrz.ccApiCart.CART_ENCID
validate()	ccrz.ccApiCart.CART_ID or ccrz.ccApiCart.CART_ENCID
ccrz.ccApiCategory	fetchCategoryTree()	ccrz.ccApiCategory.ROOTCATEGORYID
getUrl()	ccrz.ccApiCategory.CATEGORYIDLIST
ccrz.ccApiCoupon	cloneCoupon()	ccrz.ccApiCoupon.ID, ccrz.ccApiCoupon.CARTID, or ccrz.ccApiCoupon.CODES
ccrz.ccApiProduct	getUrlFor()	ccrz.ccApiProduct.PRODUCTLIST
ccrz.ccLogicProductPricing	processInputData()	ccrz.ccApiProduct.PRODUCTLIST, which is returned from the service class during ccrz.ccApiProduct.fetch()
ccrz.ccApiOrder	authCancel()	ccrz.ccApiOrder.PARAM_ORDER_STATUS
cancel()	ccrz.ccApiOrder.PARAM_ORDER_ID or ccrz.ccApiOrder.PARAM_ORDER_ENCID
fetchOrderHistory()	ccrz.ccService.SEARCHSTRING or ccrz.ccApiOrder.PARAM_ORDER_ID_LIST
getOrdersToSplit()	ccrz.ccApiOrder.PARAM_STOREFRONT
reorder()	ccrz.ccApiOrder.PARAM_ORDER_ID, ccrz.ccApiOrder.PARAM_ORDER_ENCID, ccrz.ccApiOrder.PARAM_ORDER_ID_LIST, or ccrz.ccApiOrder.PARAM_ORDER_ENCID_LIST
splitOrder()	ccrz.ccApiOrder.PARAM_STOREFRONT or ccrz.ccApiOrder.PARAM_ORDER_ID
ccrz.ccApiSiteIndex	create()	ccrz.ccApiSiteIndex.STOREFRONT, ccrz.ccApiSiteIndex.LOCALES, or ccrz.ccApiSiteIndex.CATEGORY_IDS
mapUrl()	ccrz.ccApiSiteIndex.FULL_URL
remove()	ccrz.ccApiSiteIndex.IDS
ccrz.ccApiStoredPayment	create()	ccrz.ccApiStoredPayment.STOREDPAYMENTLIST
remove()	ccrz.ccApiStoredPayment.ID or ccrz.ccApiStoredPayment.IDS
ccrz.ccApiUser	createUser()	ccrz.ccApiUser.USER_NEW
login()	

ccrz.ccApiUser.USER_NAME

AND

ccrz.ccApiUser.USER_PWD


getProfileData()	ccrz.ccApiUser.USER_ID
ccrz.ccApiWishList	createCart()	ccrz.ccApiWishList.ID
remove()	ccrz.ccApiWishList.ID or ccrz.ccApiWishList.ENCRYPTED_ID
removeFrom()	ccrz.ccApiWishList.WISHLIST_ITEM_IDS

title: Account for Required Input Keys in API Methods
